Action.title: Add to favorites
Action.description: Add this game to your favorites. Favorites are created for personal use and other users cannot view them.

Create.title: Create favorites
Create.description: Create a favorites. You can view and manage your favorites in your personal center.

validation.nameMinLength: Favorites name must be at least {length} characters
validation.nameMaxLength: Favorites name must be at most {length} characters
validation.descriptionMaxLength: Favorites description must be at most {length} characters
